meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of granolithic material.
meanings.sent1: The granolithic floor was smooth and sturdy.
meanings.sent2: The sidewalk was made of granolithic material.
meanings.sent3: The granolithic path seemed to sparkle in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as solid and granolithic as the ground beneath our feet.
meanings.sent5: The granolithic walls of the building stood tall and imposing.

meanings.definition: Made of or resembling granolithic material.
meanings.sent1: The granolithic steps were easy to climb.
meanings.sent2: The statue had a granolithic appearance.
meanings.sent3: The granolithic bench looked like a giant piece of chocolate.
meanings.sent4: His voice echoed through the room, granolithic and strong.
meanings.sent5: The granolithic structure blended seamlessly with the surroundings.
